description: Try our easy to follow Bacon & Noodle Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta bake,High fibre,High protein,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Chicken,Budget,Peanut free
name: Bacon & Noodle Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g middle bacon, rind removed, finely shredded
4 cups baby leaf salad mix (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease an 8-cup capacity baking dish. Cook noodles as per packet instructions. Drain well.
Heat a frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook for 5 minutes or until golden. Set aside to cool.

Whisk eggs and milk together in a large bowl. Add noodles, bacon, onion, peas, flour and cheese to egg mixture. Stir until combined. Transfer to prepared baking dish. Bake for 35 minutes or until cooked through and golden. Serve with a mixed salad.
